addtestview.confidence_level_description: The confidence level dictates the amount of errors allowed. A higher percentage directly correlates to the accuracy of the test results. This denotes whether the difference measured between the control page and variant page is not by chance (i.e. significant).
addtestview.conversion_description: By default, all goals have equal weight. You can set an individual weight for each goal in
addtestview.error_conversiongoal: You must select a conversion goal before you can start the Experiment.
addtestview.error_date_in_the_past: The starting date/time of the test cannot be in the past.
addtestview.error_duplicate_kpi_values: Duplicate goals may not share the same values
addtestview.error_duration: Duration must be a valid integer between 1 and 365
addtestview.error_invalid_date_time_value: The information entered is not a valid date/time value
addtestview.error_participation_percentage: Participation percentage must be between 1 and 100
addtestview.error_test_not_schedulded_or_started: not scheduled, resolve starting date/time errors in order to schedule a test
addtestview.goals_default_text: Example: Get more click-throughs to download the ebook by changing the advertisement image.
addtestview.goals_weight_description: Here you can decide if one of the goals is more important than the others when measuring a winner.
addtestview.goals_weight_equal_description: If you give all goals the same importance, conversions towards all goals are measured the same way.
addtestview.goals_weight_heading: Balance the importance of the experiments:
addtestview.goals_weight_higher_description: If you give a goal a higher importance, conversions towards that goal will count higher than conversions towards the ones with a lower setting.
addtestview.notscheduled_text: not scheduled, and will start now
addtestview.participant_percentage_tip: More participation reduces time to gather statistics and pick a winner.
addtestview.test_description: Determine whether new or changed content improves the conversion rate.

admin.autopublishwinner: Automatically publish the winner of the test if the results are statistically significant?
admin.description: These settings are the defaults values used for when creating AB tests.
admin.durationerror: Test duration must be between 1 and 365.
admin.invalid: One or more values are not of the correct format.
admin.participationerror: Participation percentage must be between 1 and 100.
admin.cookiedelimeter: Cookie Delimeter (Only to be changed while there are no active tests; otherwise, it could lead to inaccurate test results):
admin.delimetererror: Cookie delimeter must be a single character.

archivedtestcomponent.description: Shows archived tests for the selected content.
archivedtestcomponent.title: Archived Tests

archiveview.content_selected: This version was picked as the winner
archiveview.goal_not_specified: A goal has not been specified.

canceltestcommand.abort_confirmation_message: Are you sure you want to abort this test?

detailsview.abort_confirmation_message: Are you sure you want to abort this test?
detailsview.goal_not_specified: A goal has not been specified.
detailsview.test_not_started_text: This test has not yet started.
detailsview.test_status_completed: Test completed, now go on and pick a winner...
detailsview.test_disabled: Experiment is currently disabled. No additional views or conversions will be recorded for any test until A/B testing is re-enabled.

notificationbar.completed_test: An Experiment was completed on a version of this content.
notificationbar.ongoing_test: A version of this content is part of an on-going Experiment.
notificationbar.scheduled_test: An Experiment is scheduled to run on a version of this content
notificationbar.winner_link_tooltip: View test details and pick winner
notificationbar.test_disabled: Experiment is currently disabled. No additional views or conversions will be recorded for any test until A/B testing is re-enabled.

pickwinnerview.early_pick_winner_message: This test has not been completed yet, but you may pick a winner. Picking a winner now will end the test and publish the chosen content.
pickwinnerview.goal_not_specified: A goal has not been specified
pickwinnerview.result_is_not_significant: The results of this test are NOT significant.
pickwinnerview.test_not_started_text: This test has not yet started.
pickwinnerview.test_disabled: Experiment is currently disabled. No additional views or conversions will be recorded for any test until A/B testing is re-enabled. You can still pick a winner or abort the test.

publishing.error_cannot_publish: You cannot publish content while it is being tested. To publish your content, choose a winner or cancel the current test.
publishing.error_cannot_schedule_publish: You cannot schedule content to be published while it is being tested. To schedule your content to be published, choose a winner or cancel the current test.

scheduler_plugin.description: Scans the list of pending or active Marketing tests and changes the test state based on the Start Date and End Date for the test.
